member.name: T:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1
member.summary: The Grid control to display data using a transposed layout, where columns represent data items and rows represent item properties. Also this control allows to display each item in multiple columns.

member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets the grid's column collection.

member.summary: Override to hide this property.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.AutoGenerateColumns
member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets whether the grid should generate columns automatically based on the itemsSource.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.AllowDragging
member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets whether users are allowed to drag rows and/or columns with the mouse.

member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets which parts of the grid provide cell merging.

member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets the name of the property used to generate child rows in hierarchical grids.

member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Occurs when the user finishes dragging a column.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.OnClientDraggingRow

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.ColumnLayout
member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets a JSON string that defines the current column layout." remarks="The column layout string represents an array with the columns and their properties. It can be used to persist column layouts defined by users so they are preserved across sessions, and can also be used to implement undo/redo functionality in applications that allow users to modify the column layout.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.LayoutDefinition
member.summary: Gets or sets an array that defines the layout of the rows used to display each data item.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.NewRowAtTop
member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the new row template should be located at the top of the grid or at the bottom.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.AllowPinning
member.summary: Disabled for TransposedMultiRow. Gets or sets whether the grid adds pin icons to the column headers and clicking the icons toggles the column's frozen state

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.TransposedMultiRow.TransposedMultiRow`1.AllowSorting
member.summary: TransposedMultiRow does not support sorting.

member.summary: TransposedMultiRow does not support items addition.

member.summary: TransposedMultiRow does not support items deletion.

member.summary: TransposedMultiRow does not support sorting.
